H8147.def: = state in which a countable entity is two in number

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H1867.def: = man; ► king of {L:Persia<SDBH:פָּרַס>}, in post-exilic times

H259.def: = state in which a countable entity is one in number

H2320.def: = period of time, measured by a complete cycle in the phases of the moon

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H8345.def: = state in which a countable entity is the sixth in a range

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H3027.def: = the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H5030.def: = male person speaking on behalf of a deity

H2216.def: = man; ► son of {L:Shealtiel<SDBH:שְׁאַלְתִּיאֵל>} or, according to {S:01300301900000000} of {L:Pedaiah<SDBH:פְּדָיָה>}; tribe of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► governor of {L:Judea<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>} after the exile; according to {S:01300301900000000}, father of {L:Meshullam<SDBH:מְשֻׁלָּם>}, {L:Hananiah<SDBH:חֲנַנְיָה>}, and {L:Shelomith<SDBH:שְׁלֹמִית>}

H7597.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Jehoiachin<SDBH:יְהֹויָכִין>}; tribe of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► father of {L:Zerubbabel<SDBH:זְרֻבָּבֶל>}

H6346.def: = a regional governor within a larger kingdom, responsible for enforcing the law of the king, collecting taxes for the king, and leading regional armies

H3063.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of {L:Solomon<SDBH:שְׁלֹמֹה>}, and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

H3091.def: = man, also known as {L:Hoshea<SDBH:הֹושֵׁעַ>} and {L:Jeshua<SDBH:יֵשׁוּעַ>}; ◄ son of {L:Nun<SDBH:נוּן>}; tribe of {L:Ephraim<SDBH:אֶפְרַיִם>}; ► one of the twelve men sent by {L:Moses<SDBH:מֹשֶׁה>} to spy out the land; his name was Hoshea, later changed by Moses to {L:Joshua<SDBH:יְהֹושֻׁעַ>}; Moses' assistant, who later became his successor and brought {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} into {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>}

H3087.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Seraiah<SDBH:שְׂרָיָה>}; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► father of {L:Jeshua<SDBH:יֵשׁוּעַ>}/{L:Joshua<SDBH:יְהֹושׁוּעַ>}, high {L:priest<SDBH:כֹּהֵן>}; time of exile

H3548.def: = person {L:ordained<SDBH:מלא>} and {L:consecrated<SDBH:קדשׁ>} to perform religious services on behalf of others

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H7760.def: = action by which individuals or groups of humans place themselves in a certain position or configuration

H3824.def: = the organ located in the centre of the human body that pumps the blood through our circulatory system, ≈ seen as the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief

H1870.def: = an open space connecting different places, ► used for travelling and transportation; ≈ often extended to denote our life as a journey from birth to death, and the totality of our activities during our lives

H2232.def: = action by which humans scatter seeds or plant young plants in a field so that they may grow into a new crop; ≈ associated with the concept of investing in order to get a return; also associated with reproduction and perpetuation

H4592.def: = small quantity of objects or substance

H398.def: = action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object

H369.def: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non-existant

H7654.def: = state in which there is an abundance of a certain commodity

H3847.def: = state in which humans wear certain clothes, often for a specific purpose

H2552.def: = process by which human or inanimate objects feel or become warm or hot

H7936.def: = action by which humans make their services available to other humans for a limited amount of time and in return for payment

H6872.def: = small container ◄ made of cloth; ► used to transport money, pack aromatic spices in order to put it between clothes, etc .; ≈ associated with possessions and treasures

H1870.def: = an open space connecting different places, ► used for travelling and transportation; ≈ often extended to denote our life as a journey from birth to death, and the totality of our activities during our lives

H5927.def: = process by which a substance or other object appears to move up by itself

H2022.def: = a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a {L:hill<SDBH:גִּבְעָה>}

H6086.def: = any kind of tall, woody plant that grows from a single trunk and with several lateral branches that often bear leaves and fruit

H7521.def: = state in which an animal or its meat is acceptable to God as sacrifice

H3513.def: = state in which objects have relatively much weight, ≈ which is often associated with slowness, functioning with difficulty, but also with importance, riches, status, etc.

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H3282.def: = a linker introducing a proposition denoting the reason for what precedes

H4100.def: = a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified

H5002.def: = action by which humans or deities make a prophetic statement; in the case of a deity this is usually done through the mouth of a prophet or seer

H2720.def: = state in which food is free from moisture or liquid

H7323.def: = action by which humans walk at a relatively high speed

H8064.def: = the area above the earth, the location of sun, moon, and stars, the realm of the birds and God's primary residence; seen as the source of dew, rain, hail, snow, thunder and lightning, and sometimes even food; associated with what is high and remote, created by God and bound to disappear one day

H3607.def: = causative action by which humans hold other humans under control, either in a prison or in another situation in which that person does not have the freedom to act and go at will

H2919.def: = condensed moisture resulting from contact of air and cooler land surfaces; ►an important source of water for vegetation; ≈ regarded as refreshing, life-enhancing; associated with fertility

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H2981.def: = general term for plants that are sources of food; ≈ a sign of God's blessing

H7121.def: = action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another

H2721.def: = state in which an object is free from moisture or liquid

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H2022.def: = a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a {L:hill<SDBH:גִּבְעָה>}

H1715.def: = seeds of cultivated cereal; ► used as food

H8492.def: = dark red alcoholic liquid; ◄ made out of newly harvested grapes and possibly still at the beginning of the fermentation process; ► used as beverage and for sacrifice; ≈ represents the entire range of agricultural products in Israel, together with grain and oil; associated with joy and well-being, and only once with drunkenness and foolishness{N:001}

H3323.def: = high quality {L:oil<SDBH:שֶׁמֶן>}, ◄ extracted from the fruits of the olive tree during the first pressing; ► used as food and in various religious rituals

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H127.def: = the surface of the earth, containing the substance that God used to create animals and humans, and to which they return when they die; on this surface plants and trees grow, humans labor to grow crops and worship God, who sustains all life, but who can also strike it with a curse so that nothing grows again

H3318.def: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position

H120.def: = human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between {L:male<SDBH:זָכָר>} and {L:female<SDBH:נְקֵבָה>}; ≈ associated with mortality

H929.def: often used as collective: = general term for any land animal, as opposed to {L:humans<SDBH:אָדָם>}, {L:birds<SDBH:עֹוף>}, {L:reptiles<SDBH:רֶמֶשׂ>}, {L:insects<SDBH:שֶׁרֶץ>}, and {L:fish<SDBH:דָּג>}

H3018.def: = action by which humans are engaged in laborious work which requires a lot of energy and ultimately results in exhaustion

H3709.def: = the inner part of the human {L:hand<SDBH:יָד>}, but with special focus on the activities performed with it, such as holding, covering, or lifting objects, leaning on a staff, clapping, etc.

H2216.def: = man; ► son of {L:Shealtiel<SDBH:שְׁאַלְתִּיאֵל>} or, according to {S:01300301900000000} of {L:Pedaiah<SDBH:פְּדָיָה>}; tribe of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► governor of {L:Judea<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>} after the exile; according to {S:01300301900000000}, father of {L:Meshullam<SDBH:מְשֻׁלָּם>}, {L:Hananiah<SDBH:חֲנַנְיָה>}, and {L:Shelomith<SDBH:שְׁלֹמִית>}

H7597.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Jehoiachin<SDBH:יְהֹויָכִין>}; tribe of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► father of {L:Zerubbabel<SDBH:זְרֻבָּבֶל>}

H3091.def: = man, also known as {L:Hoshea<SDBH:הֹושֵׁעַ>} and {L:Jeshua<SDBH:יֵשׁוּעַ>}; ◄ son of {L:Nun<SDBH:נוּן>}; tribe of {L:Ephraim<SDBH:אֶפְרַיִם>}; ► one of the twelve men sent by {L:Moses<SDBH:מֹשֶׁה>} to spy out the land; his name was Hoshea, later changed by Moses to {L:Joshua<SDBH:יְהֹושֻׁעַ>}; Moses' assistant, who later became his successor and brought {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} into {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>}

H3087.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Seraiah<SDBH:שְׂרָיָה>}; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► father of {L:Jeshua<SDBH:יֵשׁוּעַ>}/{L:Joshua<SDBH:יְהֹושׁוּעַ>}, high {L:priest<SDBH:כֹּהֵן>}; time of exile

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H4397.def: = a human or supernatural being who carries a message on behalf of someone else

H589.def: = referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

H5782.def: = process by which someone wakes up from his sleep

H7307.def: = an invisible being that is in a direct relation to and under control of God and one of his manifestation, often described as a substance that can be poured out, ► through whom the universe is created and animated; it can manifest itself as an invisible force equipping humans with wisdom, skill, and strength for specific tasks; it can also manifest itself as a movement of air through the bodies of animate creatures (breath) or through nature (wind)
